eu.cqse.check.framework.checktest

Class CheckTestBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.cqse.check.framework.checktest.CheckTestBase

  • @TestInstance(value=PER_CLASS)
public abstract class CheckTestBase
extends java.lang.Object
    Parameterized test for check implementations. This base class is based on a mockup of the teamscale infrastructure used in production.

    • Field Summary

protected void setUpCheckInfoMap()
                                      throws java.io.IOException

      • determineLanguage

        public static ELanguage determineLanguage(CheckInfo checkInfo,
                                          java.lang.String uniformPath)
        Determines the language to use for the test file based on the ELanguages of the check and the ending of the uniform path.

      • buildCheckInfoMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CheckInfo> buildCheckInfoMap(java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Builds a map from simple class names to check infos. The simple class name must be unique. The rationale here is avoid classes with same name in different packages (confusing) but also make the test-data more readable. The clazz will be used to resolve the classpath to search for checks.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • runCheckAndAssertFindings

        protected void runCheckAndAssertFindings(java.lang.String checkSimpleName,
                                         ExpectedDataContainer expectedDataContainer,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> options,
                                         java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CheckInfo> checkInfoBySimpleClassName)
                                  throws CheckException
        Asserts that the check executed on the given code file returns the findings as described by the findings string.
        Throws:
        CheckException
